com.xmlmind.ditac.preprocess

Enum Media

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Media>
      • com.xmlmind.ditac.preprocess.Media
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Media>

    public enum Media
extends java.lang.Enum<Media>
    The media associated to the output format.
    See Also:
    PreProcessor.setMedia(com.xmlmind.ditac.preprocess.Media)

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      PRINT

      SCREEN
      Screen media (xhtml, html, Java Help, HTML Help, etc).
